front.title: •General Dodonna (V)
front.gametext: Once per game, if at a war room, may take a related battleground (or a Y-wing) into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. While present at a war room, opponent's spies may not deploy here and your Epic Event destiny draws are +1.
front.lore: Skilled tactician and natural leader. Planned attack on Death Star after analyzing technical readouts provided by Princess Leia. Star Destroyer captain during Old Republic.
